description.ko: 정밀한 기하학적 형태와 글리치 아트의 혼돈스러운 아름다움이 결합된 디지털 해체의 시각적 탐구입니다. KURO-X는 날카로운 각도와 파편화된 데이터 스트림을 통해 현대적 미학을 재정의합니다.
description.en: A visual exploration of digital deconstruction, where precise geometric forms meet the chaotic beauty of glitch art. KURO-X redefines modern aesthetics through sharp angles and fragmented data streams.

prompt: KURO-X branding visual, geometric glitch aesthetic, high-tech digital distortion, sharp geometric shards and prisms, chromatic aberration, pixel sorting effects, dark tech noir atmosphere, deep blacks with electric cyan and magenta accents, ultra-modern futuristic typography, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, abstract data corruption.
